recipes.label: A Gift from Dr Blackwood
recipes.startdescription:
A package from Dr Serena Blackwood, who once also served as Librarian here:

'Librarian: I remember very well how remote Brancrug is from the world. In Alexandria, I have both a telegraph office and more company than I can easily stand. You will, I think, make better use of this than I.

Best wishes
 Serena'

recipes.label: Request Agdistis's Presence
recipes.startdescription: I have enough here to craft a letter inviting Agdistis to Brancrug.
recipes.desc: Now I just need to post it.

recipes.label: Note Agdistis's Address
recipes.startdescription: For what you might call an 'occult correspondence'.
recipes.desc: 'But will they come when you do call for them?'
